sqlMap.sql: select instructor.id as id, person.first_name as firstName, person.last_name as lastName, person.address as address, person.city as city, person.state as state, person.zip_code as zipCode, person.type as type, instructor.employee_id as employeeId, instructor.department as department, location.name as office from universitySystem.instructor instructor left join universitySystem.person person on person.type_id = instructor.id and person.type = "INSTRUCTOR" left join universitySystem.Location location on location.id = instructor.office
sqlMap.select: left join universitySystem.COURSE course on course.instructor_id = instructor.id where course.id = #value#
select instructor.id as value from universitySystem.INSTRUCTOR instructor left join universitySystem.COURSE course on course.instructor_id = instructor.id where course.id = #value#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into universitySystem.instructor (employee_id, department, office) VALUES (#instructor.employeeId#, #instructor.department#, #locationId#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update universitySystem.instructor set employee_id = #instructor.employeeId#, department = #instructor.department#, office = #locationId# where id = #instructor.id#
